means: 双折的记事板，双折的画

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... dipterous 双廊堂 diptych 双折记事板 dire 可怕的.
双联画（diptych） 在一个画面中使用两张照片的一种照片表现形式。参见“三联画”。
视觉艺术科词语中英对照表 - 学生专区 -... ... 双连屏 diptych 双连画 diptych 双连雕刻 diptych.

list.abs: installation 装置ivory diptych 象牙双联板latex 乳胶

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: via late Latin from late Greek diptukha 'pair of writing tablets', neuter plural of Greek diptukhos 'folded in two', from di- 'twice' + ptukhē 'a fold'

means.word_mean: 1. a painting or carving (especially an altarpiece) on two panels (usually hinged like a book)

auth_sentence.content: Wednesday's back page was a disciplinary diptych.
